pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, July 8, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the unveiling of the Humanity Art Installation. President of the Treasury Board Mona Fortier, National Capital Commission CEO Tobi Nussbaum, and Vice-Chairman and President of the Toronto Raptors and Giants of Africa Co-Founder Masai Ujiri will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact Tamara@giantsofafrica.org for details.
